relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Writers' Community's Stewardship and Sustainability Podcast Series.
Today we have the opportunity to visit with Farmer and Expert Educator Pat Frazier.
Pat Frazier has been a biodynamic farmer for over 20 years.

relationships.evidence_text: In biodynamics we have an association with certain plants on earth with certain planets.
And those associations are what create some of the herbs and the fermented preparations that we use for fertility in biodynamics.
one of the plants that associated with Saturn is in full bloom.

relationships.evidence_text: the only quality that Saturn had was warmth.

relationships.evidence_text: It was the quality of warmth that generated all life.
